metadata.title: CVE-2017-2910 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability exists in the xls_addCell function of libxls 2.0. A specially crafted xls file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious xls file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
